channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3 potholes became 1, 25th March
item.description:
W3W: Replayed/salads/moons Three potholes have become one. Struck it at approximately 1945 hours 25/03/2025 and put a golf ball size in bulge requiring two new tires

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

pothole causing damage to vehicle (customer states other vehicles have been damaged too)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge hole that nearly takes my car out every time I drive over it. Instead of closing roads left right and sideways for cycle paths, try repairing, 25th March
item.description:
On the main road to Evesham after the turning to Bishops Cleeve and before the Farms Arms pub on the north bound carriageway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two - refilled trenches that have been poorly done and sinking. Causing vehicles to bang over the poorly done infill., 25th March
item.description:
The two infills that go across the width of the road are at - What 3 Words locations - rotate.singer.gravy and towns.perky.rigid Please can these be redone properly. You have constructions team on site doing the much needed bike lanes. Trust this will therefore be done promptly. It was dug up and refilled but itâ€™s sinking causing your car a severe bang when driving over it, or worse, swerving from motorists trying to avoid it, which is now made even worse since the road has become reduced in width to accommodate the bike path. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 25th March
item.description:
2 HOUR WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE NEEDED PLEASE REMOVE X1 DAMAGED LEANING LOSE POST AND MAKE SAFE WITH X4 1 METER BARRIERS AND X4 SANDBAGS I WILL PASS PERMANENT REPAIR ON TO AHR TODAY (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign has been cut off to prevent people walking on the footpath through fieldd, 25th March
item.description:
The footpath sign has been cut off to prevent people walking on the footpath through the field (the actual footpath is also highly unusable with no stiles, barbed wire and blocked entry/exit points).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Branch Road, The Reddings, Cheltenham

item.title: Dog poo on Pilley Lane, 25th March
item.description:
I'm so sorry but there's yet more poo on Pilley Lane just opposite the church (across the road); please could it be cleaned up as people keep standing in it. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
